column2: Elevate Your Impact Through Innovation and Learning Evalueserve is a global leader in delivering innovative and sustainable solutions to a diverse range of clients, including over 30% of Fortune 500 companies.  With presence in more than 45 countries across five continents, we excel in leveraging state-of-the-art technology, artificial intelligence, and unparalleled subject matter expertise to elevate our clients' business impact and strategic decision-making.  We have 4,500+ talented professionals operating across 45 countries, including India, China, Chile, Romania, the US, and Canada. Our global network also extends to emerging markets such as Colombia, the Middle East, and the rest of Asia-Pacific.  Recognized by  Great Place to Work  in India, Chile, Romania, the US, and the UK in 2022, we offer a dynamic, growth-oriented, and open culture that prioritizes flexible work-life balance, diverse and inclusive teams, and equal opportunities for all.    About Intellectual Property and Research & Development (IPR&D) Evalueserve is a leading global provider of innovation intelligence and IP solutions. Our global team of world-class IPR&D analysts and innovation consultants work with a large customer base of leading Fortune 200 active clients offering insights, research, advisory, and consulting services to create some of the worlds most advanced products. With two decades of expertise across diverse domains and search types, our unique in-house research development and innovation intelligence team comprising patent analysts, innovation intelligence specialists, technical specialists, licensing analysts, patent agents, and IP docketing specialists have a deep understanding of global regulatory trends and are adept at handling large patent portfolios. As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to work alongside top industry experts across the entire innovation cycle and provide strategic insights to shape the future. What you will be doing at Evalueserve Have in-depth knowledge and subject matter expertise of specific technology area: For example, either of: - Technological domains such mechanical/automotive/mechatronics      etc Elementary knowledge in other technical domains. Ready to gain knowledge in other      domains to certain extent, to further handle projects along with other technical experts Knowledge of Intellectual Property (IP) fundamentals and/or Patent laws (US) Have knowledge of key terminology, latest trends, key industry metrics Fair understanding of patent classification system (CPC/IPC) and how different patents gets classified by the PTO offices Experience in performing Re-classification of patent documents into different CPC/IPC      classes for specific technology domain(s) Reviewing work products of other team members and handling client communication Experience in handling team(s) to perform Re-classification of patent documents into      different IPC/CPC classes for specific technology domain(s)     What were looking for Professionals with PhD, Masters, Bachelors degree in: Mechanical With relevant work experience of around 5-9 years working in IP space Experience to handle team(s) and handle projects end-to-end Advanced Excel skills Effective project and people management skills. Managing teams of 4-8 analysts/senior analysts, and providing on the job training, mentoring and coaching for the team Coordinate with the client stakeholders to understand project requests, define scope of research and regularly communicate to provide updates on projects Demonstrate domain knowledge and thought leadership while dealing with client team Take pro-active charge of quality control process and ensure timeline and quality related SLA adherence Experience in handling IP projects/solutions, via automations and/or third-party tools Disclaimer:  The following job description serves as an informative reference for the tasks you may be required to perform. column2: MAIN TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES   POSITION OVERVIEW  We are seeking a bright and enthusiastic Information System Specialists (Entry Level to Experienced) to join our team and help us to implement a centralized information system that is easy to use, standardized, and automated for real-time reporting. You need to analyse, test and assess systems requirements, develop and implement information systems development plans, policies and procedures, and provide advice on a wide range of information systems issues. We offer opportunities for career advancement and specialization for those with more experience and ambition.   MAIN TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES Create and configure Monday.com boards, workflows, and automations to streamline data collection, processing, and reporting. Integrate Monday.com with Jotform and other web applications to ensure seamless data exchange and real-time visibility. Create configurations in Jotform.  Participate in training and support sessions to ensure end-users can effectively utilize new systems. Conduct thorough analysis of current information systems and procedures to identify areas for improvement and standardization. You will lead the team with training, expertise, mentoring, and best practices related to enterprise application technology, architecture, and support. column2: Research and Development Execute all the R&D projects into scale-up and tech transfer phase by strictly adhering to the Stage Gate Process?? Generate engineering data in the lab for supporting scale-up activities (reaction kinetics, optimization, crystallization, distillation, filtration, drying) During lab process optimization phase, suggest the experiments to generate engineering, data points as per the agreed-upon format of Lab Development Report Throughout the process optimization phase in Mini-Plant/ Pilot Plant, drive process development initiatives and is responsible for generating data as per the agreed-upon format of Technology Dossier. column2: ROLE OVERVIEW: We are seeking a highly skilled Radar Signal Processing Engineer to join our team focused on the development of RADAR systems. As a Radar Signal Processing Engineer, you will be responsible for developing advanced signal processing algorithms and techniques to interpret data from various radar modalities, including Pulse, Continuous Wave (CW), Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave (FMCW), Doppler, and Stepped Frequency Continuous Wave (SFCW). Your role will involve: RESPONSIBILITIES: Design and optimize advanced signal processing algorithms for detection, estimation, prediction, and tracking across diverse radar modalities using MATLAB and Python. Ensure algorithms meet real-world performance requirements and are computationally efficient. Develop software solutions in MATLAB and Python for algorithm implementation, testing, and performance evaluation. Optimize code for parallel processing and real-time execution on hardware platforms. Collaborate closely with hardware engineers to integrate signal processing algorithms with radar hardware components. Optimize algorithms for efficient execution on hardware platforms such as FPGAs, DSPs, and custom ASICs. Develop simulation models in MATLAB and Python to generate synthetic radar data for algorithm validation and testing. Simulate radar wave propagation and target interactions to generate realistic radar returns. Implement post-signal processing techniques such as clutter suppression, target localization, and feature extraction using MATLAB and Python. Enhance radar data interpretation and target detection performance. Design and develop signal processing algorithms specifically tailored for Ground-Penetrating Radar (GPR) systems Continuously maintain and improve radar signal processing algorithms through rigorous evaluation, analysis, and fine-tuning, incorporating insights from real-world data analysis. Integrate signal processing algorithms with overall radar system architecture and conduct comprehensive system-level testing, ensuring functionality, performance, and compliance with system requirements. Provide input to hardware engineers on radar system design requirements for signal processing, specifying hardware components, interfaces, and processing units to optimize system performance. Document all aspects of algorithm development, software implementation, hardware integration, and testing procedures using MATLAB and Python. Prepare detailed technical reports and presentations to communicate findings, challenges, and solutions effectively. QUALIFICATIONS: A Bachelor's, Master's, or Ph.D. degree in Electrical Engineering, Electronics Engineering, Signal Processing, Computer Science, or related fields. Strong understanding of signal processing theory, digital signal processing (DSP), radar principles, and related mathematical concepts. Proficiency in programming languages such as MATLAB and Python, with knowledge of C/C++ being beneficial. Experience with radar systems and familiarity with radar signal processing algorithms (e.g., time-domain processing, frequency-domain processing, beamforming). Knowledge of electromagnetic wave propagation phenomena and their interactions with different materials in the context of radar applications. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex radar data and troubleshoot algorithmic issues. Ability to work effectively in multidisciplinary teams, collaborate with hardware engineers, and communicate technical concepts clearly. Research skills for conducting independent research, innovating, and developing new signal processing algorithms or methodologies. Experience with radar-specific simulation software for modeling radar systems and validating algorithms. Commitment to continuous learning and staying updated on advancements in radar technology and signal processing techniques. SKILLS NEEDED: Excellent organizational and time management skills. Strong attention to detail and accuracy. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Ability to prioritize tasks and meet deadlines. Self Motivated, Energetic and Disciplined REPORTS TO: : Team Lead Join our team and take the next step in your career!
column11: Radar Signal Processing, Radar, MATLAB, GNU Radio, Python, Ground Penetrating Radar, Radar Imaging Algorithms, Digital Signal Processing

column2: We are an integrated sustainability consulting company. Offering our services to large multinational beverages and water-intensive corporations in India and South East Asia. Currently, we are looking for a Junior Geophysicist - Hydrogeologist. Aspiring candidates must have completed M.Tech /MSc. Applied Geology and geophysics with Hydrogeology as a specialization. The position involves undertaking onsite VES/ERT studies, Aquifer performance tests/Pumping tests, and intensive hydrogeological Assessments and studies related to GW exploration, water potentials, yields, and prospects, capable of handling GIS requirements, and modeling. Expertise in watershed-based hydrogeological studies, geophysical results analysis, and integration with hydrogeological context. Undertaking Rainwater harvesting, catchment assessment studies, and design reviews, and having a minimum of 4 + years of working experience is a must in the given areas. Very good writing (technical report writing) and communication skills are essential and required as part of this position. The position deals with Groundwater and surface water assessments and has experience in hydrology, hydrogeology, geological assessment studies, VES/ERT  electrical sounding surveys, and reporting analysis. The following are the basic requirements to be met: 1. Should have good onsite experience in conducting geophysical studies  ERT/VES using diverse equipment, software applications for mapping, data interpretation and analysis of aquifer potentials, characteristics 2D & 3D mapping, etc., Must possess a good understanding of geology and hydrogeology. 2. Good understanding of geology and hydrogeology in delineating microwatersheds using toposheets and other resources, estimating water balance, preparing land use and land cover maps and analysis, and hydrogeology using GIS-related software applications. Experience in groundwater modeling and surface water modeling is an added advantage. 3. Ability to map aquifer by conducting pump tests and lithological assessments and interpretations 4. Should be able to review, and assess groundwater and surface water, run-off, and percolation ??groundwater recharge potentials in designing rainwater-harvesting projects for industries and communities. 5. Attitude, aspirations, and motivation as self-learner ??team leader and good motivator The eligible candidates may send their updated resumes to?hr@mainstayin.com?within one week. The position is based in Secunderabad and may involve a minimum of 3-4 day field visits once a month along with the team.? Only the shortlisted candidate will be contacted. Job Type: Full-time Initial CTC: 5 - 6 Lakhs Benefits: Cell phone reimbursement Health insurance Paid sick time Provident Fund

column2: ?       We are looking for a fixed committed period of internship either semester long internship or summer internship. We hire third year and fourth year students for summer internship and semester long internships.         If your performance goes well and we find your deliverables as per expectations, the company will provide a full time role after completion of your Internship period.         We also provide stipend for the internship         Certificate of internship will only be provided on full completion of internship period.         We provide internships to extremely knowledgeable and passionate candidates with a good educational background. (Above CGPA 8.5)         We are already recruiting interns since 2018 from excellent students from institutions including IITs, NITs and others.           Skill required:           B tech students from Mathematics and Computing, Computer Science, EE, and ECE wing can apply.         For Quant Development Interns, we are looking for students who have keen interest in Quant Development (C++, and python or R), strong knowledge of probability and statistics (e.g. Machine learning, AI Techniques. time-series analysis, pattern recognition, NLP) and python.         The role suits a self-motivated and highly energetic individual. The candidate should be highly technology driven with knowledge of latest trends and its applications.         As Intern, you will also need to explore Market Microstructure to find trading signals and opportunities. We expect you to study market data and build predictive models. Such models explore order flow which is an essential part of market microstructure study. We expect you to back test ideas for latency, PnL and other metrics.         An interest in building large-scale, real-time distributed applications and working in a data driven research environment is desired.         Knowledge of Linux         Prior experience of trading is an advantage but not necessary.         Excellent analytical skills, with strong attention to detail and ability to reach solutions. Ability to work under pressure, with minimal supervision, and in a team environment.

column2: The research lead will undertake a range of tasks as listed below.       Conceptualize and lead research related to climate mitigation and adaptation/ resilience. This includes the development of policy relevant research on low-carbon development pathways, sectoral implementation roadmaps drawing from technical analyses/ modelling studies, deep dive studies on thematic areas such as just transitions, climate resilience, carbon markets, etc.     Manage and guide teams of research staff and take responsibility to implement research activities in a timely manner.     Lead and advise researchers on research methodologies and publication of working papers, reports, case studies and policy briefs.     Engage with government and other key stakeholders to identify research needs and policy gaps.     Engage with researchers/ practitioners with research institutions/ universities/ think tanks/ civil society and plan collaborative knowledge creation and dissemination.     Publish research publications, thematic studies, low-carbon roadmaps, policy briefs, and blogs on topics related to long-term climate strategies, decarbonization, low-carbon sectoral roadmaps, sectoral transition strategies, and just transitions.     Contribute to writing policy briefs drawing on insights from the multistakeholder dialogues and government/ industry engagement.     Present research findings at government, civil society, and industry-led events.     Participate in workshops, roundtable discussions, seminars and research events related to low-carbon, climate-resilient development.     Contribute to capacity building initiatives by developing case study modules and designing sessions informed by program s research.     Coordinate with program communications team in translating technical research findings into formats that are easily accessible to diverse audiences.     Contribute to ideation, reviews, and proposal writing for ongoing and future projects in the team.     Stay updated on the policy landscape, sectoral developments, and industry trends in relation to climate policy and just transitions.           Requirements and skills that we seek:       Required       Postgraduate or doctoral degree in disciplines such as environmental science/ climate science, economics, public policy, urban/ environmental planning, development studies, energy/ environmental engineering or related subjects.     Minimum of 10-12 years of full-time research experience related to one or more of these topics: environment-development issues, energy sector, climate policy, energy-economy modelling, climate resilience/ adaptation, or related topics.     Excellent understanding of climate/ energy policy issues and ecosystem in India.     Experience in the use of quantitative, qualitative, and participatory research methods.     Well-versed in the use of SPSS/ R/ STATA for statistical analyses.     Prior experience in designing and leading research programs.     Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work with and engage team members from different disciplinary backgrounds and different levels of research experience.     Strong writing skills demonstrated through publications related to natural resource management, climate mitigation, adaptation/ resilience, low-carbon transitions, development impacts, or related topics.     Openness to design policy-relevant research activities using appropriate research methods.     Well-organised with attention to detail and ability to manage multiple assignments in a timely manner.     Excellent written and oral communication skills; ability to convey research findings to non-specialist audiences.     Willingness to travel to project locations, organize/ participate in workshops, seminars, and conferences.     Desirable       Broad understanding of energy-economy modelling approaches and experience in using one or more modelling tools.     Knowledge of systems thinking and systems mapping.     Prior experience in using Vensim/ STELLA.     Experience in the use of QGIS/ ArcGIS for spatial analyses.     Prior experience in conducting stakeholder consultations and field-based research.

column2: This position will have major responsibilities in analyzing elements affecting the Middle East and Africa oil markets (crude oil, condensate and NGLs, downstream refining, oil trade and prices, petroleum product demand, inventory, and petroleum policies) in the global context, and presenting results in both written reports and client-facing interactions. Contribute to deliverables of the long-term analytics and country profile updating. Opportunities to be part of the brand-new analytics platform creation with potential to reshape analytics industry and personal career path.             What We re Looking For     :         Basic Qualifications:         Bachelor s degree, preferably in refining, economics, engineering, business administration, or similar field     Minimum four years of full-time experience in refining analytics, energy industry consulting, investment banking, equity research or equivalent professional experience; A fundamental understanding of the Middle East and Africa downstream oil industry is preferred.     Excellent communication skills and superb in oral and written English. Must be able to effectively present forecasts and supporting materials to clients in regular reports, phone calls, emails, and web/live conferences.     Strong ability to identify vital short-term dynamics in oil industry by exploiting data and information with multiple quantitative tools, visualization platforms and qualitative methods. Preferred Qualifications   :       Strong background in engineering and refining     Experience covering the Middle East and Africa oil markets in the global context. column2: JD Executive Search Researcher Position Overview Accenture is seeking a passionate Executive Search Researcher to identify top talent for our most critical Leadership mandates. column2: Job Description for Jr. R&D Associate. Searching for a reliable and highly skilled Junior  R&D  chemist (5+ years) for an emerging Pharmaceutical Manufacturing company based out of Hyderabad, Its a rising company in the Pharma CDMO industry with deep relations with various high-stakes players in this industry and a dedicated and motivated team. Your roles and responsibilities include but not limited to: 1. Collaborate closely with senior R&D personnel to actively support and contribute to ongoing research and development endeavors. 2. 2. Proficiently conduct literature reviews and execute experiments autonomously. 3. Demonstrate expertise in manufacturing processes to effectively scale projects from laboratory to industrial scale. 4. Interact with cross-functional teams to translate scientific breakthroughs into commercially viable products. 5. Enhance current product processes and innovate new methodologies for high-demand market offerings. 6. Remain abreast of emerging trends and advancements in the field to identify novel opportunities for R&D. 7. Assist in managing project timelines, budgets, and resource allocation under the guidance of senior R&D professionals. 8. Possess comprehensive knowledge of safety protocols and adhere to GLP guidelines when handling laboratory equipment. 9. Uphold a clean and safe work environment in compliance with GLP regulations within laboratory settings. 10. Engage in periodic evaluations of laboratory operations, contributing insights for continual process enhancement. 11. Actively contribute to waste reduction efforts through ongoing research on process optimization while maintaining stringent safety standards. Qualifications and work experience required: 1.  Candidates with an undergraduate or postgraduate degree in chemistry [B.Sc. (Chemistry)/ M.Sc. (Chemistry)] from a reputed university with high academic achievements (>80% aggregate score) may apply. 2. Entry-level candidates or individuals with up to 3 years of experience in the pharmaceutical R&D sector. 3. Strong willingness to learn, adapt, and work effectively as part of a team. 4. A desire to gain experience in leading and contributing to research projects. 5. Deep understanding of chemical principles, experimental design, and analytical techniques. 6. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present complex scientific concepts to both technical and non-technical audiences. 7. Strong problem-solving abilities and a creative mindset to drive innovation and overcome scientific challenges. Physical demands/factors: While executing the responsibilities of this role, the employee must meticulously observe the chemical experiments undertaken or delegated to them, keenly noting any alterations occurring within the reactions. This necessitates strong visual acuity to discern subtle changes, fine motor skills for precise manipulation of equipment and reagents, and the ability to sustain focus for extended periods. Additionally, the employee should possess the physical endurance to stand for prolonged durations while maneuvering throughout the laboratory, ensuring accurate monitoring of experiments. Adherence to safety protocols, including the appropriate use of personal protective equipment, is imperative due to potential exposure to hazardous chemicals during observation. The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform essential functions. Interested candidates can share their CVs at  s.sourabh@randstad.in  or can connect in 7004216077
column11: R&D Chemist

column2: Job Title : Synthetic Chemist, NCE R&D Qualification : M.Sc. or Ph.D. in Organic/Medical Chemistry  Experience : 0-5 years of relevant experience in CRO, Discovery R&D, API,  Agrochemicals at R&D lab. Location: Dev Research Centre (SML Ltd), Nerul, Navi Mumbai-400706 Vacancies : 10 Job Description:   SML Limited is looking for a talented and motivated synthetic/medicinal chemist to support our internal agro-discovery program. The successful candidate will synthesize and purify compounds for the biological evaluation of insecticides, fungicides, nematicides, herbicides, and plant growth regulators using standard and advanced organic synthesis procedures. The applicant should be able to develop and troubleshoot synthetic routes directed to the target molecules as well as to carry out basic analytical and structural data analysis. In this position, the potential of the applicant to innovate both in the design of synthetic routes and in the generation of new target proposals will be valued. Good communication skills and the ability to work independently and within an international team environment are required. Candidate Specifications Education and Experience   M.Sc. or Ph.D. in organic or medicinal chemistry having excellent experience in synthesis and characterization of organic compounds. Have a sound knowledge of mechanistic and organic chemistry principles. Experience with a broad range of organic synthesis techniques (e.g. handling sensitive chemicals and working under an inert atmosphere) Excellent laboratory skills in the purification of compounds using different chromatographic methods, recrystallization, and distillation. Sound experience in the analysis of compounds using TLC. Interpretation of results obtained by spectroscopic techniques (MS, NMR, IR, etc.) Sound knowledge and experience in all aspects of laboratory safety and industrial hygiene  Demonstrated ability to work effectively across multi-disciplinary teams. Proven ability to root cause and resolve technically challenging problems. Experience in performing literature searches using chemistry databases (SciFinder, Reaxys) Preparation and maintaining lab record books and project reports.
column11: NMR, organic synthesis, MS, IR, TLC

column2: Experience Level: - 2-3 years of experience - Bachelors in Psychology, Research, Marketing, Branding or communications (Preferred) - Proven experience in market research, brand strategy, or consumer insights. - Knowledge of industry-standard market research practices Job Overview: We are seeking a talented and motivated Market/Brand Researcher to join our Brand Consultancy team in Bengaluru.  As a Market Researcher, you will play a pivotal role in helping our clients understand market trends, consumer behavior, and competitive landscapes.  You will conduct comprehensive research to gather insights that will inform strategic decisions and drive the success of our brand.  If you have a passion for consumer psychology, branding and strategic thinking, this is the perfect opportunity for you to make a significant impact in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. What do we expect from you? - Demonstrate a deep understanding of market research methodologies and tools, utilizing them effectively to gather and analyze data. - Demonstrate a deep understanding of market research methodologies and tools, utilizing them effectively to gather and analyze data. - An inclination towards brand strategy and a strong balance of thought and action. - A passion for understanding client businesses and arriving at insights that solve their challenges via their brand. - Analytical and critical thinking skills with an expert-level understanding of branding, business, and strategic planning. - Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. - Results-focused and collaborative approach grounded in brand strategy. - Excellent verbal & written communication skills.  - Must be open for travel, when required. Responsibilities : - Conduct in-depth research on market trends, industry dynamics, and consumer preferences to identify opportunities for our client's growth and innovation. - Utilize a variety of primary & secondary research methods, including surveys, interviews, desktop research and focus groups, to gather actionable insights. - Interpret research findings and translate them into actionable recommendations and strategic insights that drive branding/strategic outcomes. - Present research findings and recommendations to key stakeholders in clear, concise, and compelling formats, both verbally and through written reports. - Collaborate closely with brand managers/executives and the copywriting team to develop brand strategy by integrating the insights discovered through research. - Stay ahead of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in market research to continuously enhance the effectiveness of research methodologies and techniques.

column2: Project Role : Engineering Services Practitioner Project Role Description : Assist with end-to-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Solve engineering problems and achieve business objectives using scientific, socio-economic, technical knowledge and practical experience. Work across structural and stress design, qualification, configuration and technical management.  Must have skills : Aircraft Structural Analysis Good to have skills : NA Minimum  2  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Bachelors or Masters degree in Mechanical or Aerospace or Structural engineering Summary :As an Aircraft Structural Analysis Engineer, you will be responsible for providing end-to-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Your typical day will involve working across structural and stress design, qualification, configuration, and technical management. WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Performs static stress analysis or fatigue and damage tolerance analysis of aircraft structures using a broad range of standard hand, legacy and harmonized methods, responsible for checking various types of aircraft components and assemblies:Door Surround Structures, Side and Lower Shells, Pax and Cargo Floors, Skins, stringers, various clips, fasteners, joints and fittings etc. To support Sizing & Justification phase. What you would do in this role Experience in Sizing and justification of metallic/Composite primary and secondary aircraft structural components. Experience in Door Surround Structures/Side shells/PAX floors. Experience in GFEM/DFEM creation and Validation Knowledge of airframe static stress analysis including analytical calculation methods (HSB/Niu/Bruhn) and finite element-based analysis. Stress analysis of Metallic and Composite Aircraft Structural components using FEM, ISAMI and Hand Calculations. Experience in ISAMI based analysis. Experience in Buckling and Modal Analysis. Experience in engineering tools, (ISAMI, Hypermesh, NASTRAN, PATRAN, MS Office). Basic Knowledge on CATIA and experience in reading assembly drawings Experience in Technical Report writing skills. Who are we looking for? 1 to 4 years of Aerostructure Stress Analysis Experience Location:Bangalore Education:BE/M.Tech in Mechanical, Aerospace, Aeronautical Engineering or relevant subject Ability to work individually. Supporting continuous improvement initiatives to increase team efficiency. Highly preferred primary and secondary structure experience with good knowledge of tools and methods. Hypermesh, Nastran/Patran, ISAMI Having VBA/Python programming is an added advantage. Qualification Bachelors or Masters degree in Mechanical or Aerospace or Structural engineering

column1: ESG Research Associate - Financials and Real Estate
column2: We are seeking for ESG Research Associates to join our team in Mumbai and support the collection and analysis of ESG data for our Financials and Real Estate Sectors      The successful candidates will be part of ISS STOXX ESG s global research team and will focus on the collection and analysis of qualitative and quantitative environmental and social data from corporate disclosures      This data feeds our broad suite of ESG solutions, including our market-leading Corporate Rating              Overview:              ESG Associates research to evaluate a companys performance areas across the full range of ESG themes, including working conditions, supply chain management, sustainability governance, environmental management, and emission and resource consumption      Daily tasks include reviewing company documents such as sustainability reports, annual reports, and corporate websites, and identifying, analyzing, and processing relevant qualitative and quantitative data in line with ISS ESG s methodology      Our Associates stand for research integrity and a thorough methodical approach, paying attention to detail to achieve relevant, accurate, and reliable results      Being able to see the big picture as well as critical thinking are considered key factors for success      ISS STOXX ESG offers unique development opportunities for ESG generalists as well as thematic or sector specialists      A career with ISS STOXX ESG Research allows you to gain in-depth insight into ESG and sustainable investment      Our ESG teams are based in the Philippines, US, Australia, Germany, Sweden, India, and the UK      The successful candidate will work both independently as well as collaboratively with the local team and colleagues across our global offices      Working in a dynamic market and international environment, we put great emphasis on cooperation and offer a welcoming, collegial working atmosphere              Responsibilities:            Systematic ESG data gathering from company disclosures (eg sustainability reports, annual reports). ESG data processing, research, and analysis in line with ISS STOXX ESG methodology.          The Associate needs to have an in-depth understanding of and a strong interest in macro-level ESG issues.          An ESG Research Associate shall be responsible for tracking and monitoring developments and trends in various sectors of specialization and assessing the ESG impact of those companies on the overall sector.          Taking ownership of production targets and delivering the research within timelines outlined in the processes and quality standards.          Demonstrate proactiveness with a strong sense of ownership for the work under his/her responsibility.          Participation in quality assurance procedures. Support implementation of quality control measures and oversee research conducted by other analysts.          Review the analyst-written ESG reports and manage high-quality standards with regular ESG quality data checks.          Answer internal or external issuer queries on research reports.          Constantly endeavoring to develop knowledge and expertise on ESG themes associated with corporate ratings.          Supporting the rating team employing thought leadership and research publications, methodology reviews, and ESG market developments monitoring.          Make suggestions based on domain expertise to evaluate new data sources.          Participate in and contribute to team processes focused on strengthening our ESG product offering.                Qualifications:            Masters Degree (a degree in a relevant field such as environmental science or international human rights)          3-4 years of relevant professional experience in a sustainability-related field (environment, labor issues, human rights, etc), financial services, ESG research/Sustainable finance/Credit Ratings, think tanks focused on sustainability or academic research institutes.          Strong research skills (this includes planning and delivery, effective communications, multi-tasking, and time management).          Excellent English language skills, both written and oral (proficiency in languages such as Mandarin or Japanese is a bonus).          Ability to quickly process large amounts of data and information.          Ability to work within a team-oriented environment.          Strong attention to detail, organization skills, and ability to prioritize multiple tasks.          Ability to work independently while adhering to deadlines and balancing production volumes with high quality.          Experience with sustainability topics or key sectors is an advantage.          Experience in data collection and business research is an advantage.
column11: Supply chain management, Manager Quality Assurance, Environmental science, Business research, Data processing, Manager Quality Control, Research Associate, Japanese, Monitoring, Financial services

column1: Staff R&D/Product DVL Engineer - Engineering Process
column2: The AD&M Engineering Excellence team is seeking an individual with a solid understanding the TE engineering Processes, systems, applications, and workflows. This individual will provide guidance to the entire global AD&M engineering team with the goal of improving their efficiency, will oversee implementation/training when new Processes and will serve as an expert resource on LEAN PD for our global engineering teams to leverage when they encounter challenges. It is expected that this individual will use their experience and knowledge of our engineering processes, systems, and procedures to proactively seek ways to improve the efficiency, accuracy, and skill-level of the global AD&M users. He will be responsible for deploying an effective Knowledge management process across the AD&M. This role will also serve as a liaison between the AD&M engineering teams and other corporate functions for deployment of TE level initiatives. Additionally, they will have the responsibility of representing the interests of AD&M engineering at Advisory Group meetings and continuous improvement workshops to ensure that any upgrades or improvements will not be problematic for the AD&M engineering team. This position is a great opportunity for someone to transition from a team-focused role to an organizational-level role. Responsibilities Proactively seek opportunities for improvement Eliminate unnecessary process steps to improve efficiency and reduce waste Creation of standards/specifications that ensure consistency across the global team Develop Knowledge management Process including training material and quick-reference-guides. Be a strong advocate for Disciplined execution, Speed & Agility. Would be responsible for deploying DFSS methodology in Product design process & training other engineers in DFSS. Participate in Projects which call for changes in LEAN PD process. Interface with other functions such as PMO & TEIS to ensure system fixes/enhancements are addressed in a timely manner. Communicate regularly with the engineering teams on the status changes and new applications Migrations from existing process to new process. Requirements Bachelors degree (or higher) in Electrical, Manufacturing, Industrial or Mechanical Engineering, or related field is preferred. 10+ years of work experience in engineering, or in support of engineering functions. Experienced in using LEAN PD process for Product design using various CAD & PLM software. General understanding of all aspects of the Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) process from creation of part numbers through product maturity and eventual obsolescence. DFSS BB Certified. Ability to effectively engage and communicate with global engineering teams. A passion for improving engineering efficiency by reducing wasted in our engineering processes Ability to serve as an advocate for engineering when interfacing with IT, Advisory Groups, Tiger Teams, etc.

The skills for success                         Supply Chain Management     Relationship Management     Distribution Logistics     Logistics Management     Management Third-party Logistics Providers     Supply Chain Planning     Supply Management     Procurement

column2: The successful candidate would support the delivery of outputs and outcomes pertaining to green mobility through impactful research and multi-stakeholder engagement.     This would broadly entail the following:        Contribute to the research initiatives of Green Mobility.      Conduct in-dept primary and secondary research.     Conduct quantitative and qualitative data/information collection and analysis.      Write analytical reports, policy papers, articles and other forms of communication materials suitable for policy and public engagement.      Engage with a diverse group of stakeholders (government, businesses, investors, philanthropic funders, NGOs, media etc.) for conducting and disseminating research.     Organize physical and virtual workshops/seminars/meetings as per requirement.      Contribute to design and development of new programmes and initiatives.      Any other related assignments as may be entrusted by the reporting authority.        Required Qualification Skills       Education:    A bachelor s degree in engineering (preferably automobile), and a master s degree in management or energy studies or public policy or economics.        Experience:          6-8 years of full-time experience in qualitative and quantitative socio-economic or public policy research or management advisory/consulting (preferably focused on automobile sector or energy sector).      Experience in report writing is a must.      Experience of designing and executing stakeholder consultation is must          Competencies:          Excellent quantitative and analytical skills.      Proficiency in research and writing.     Ability to comprehend and work on interdisciplinary matters.      Ability to build connections and engage with a diverse group of people on research and policy issues on multiple platforms.      Ability to organize and document structured primary research/consultations for research.      Confident, collegial, and passionate, with an appreciation of the role of think tanks in shaping policies and programmes.      Ability to manage time and priorities; work independently under tight deadlines and be a team player.
column11: Program Associate, Analytical skills, CVS, Stakeholder Engagement, Automobile, Primary research, Report writing, Consulting, Management, Secondary research

column2: Mynvax Private Limited, a clinical stage vaccine biotechnology company is seeking applications for a Research Associate in process development to support its RD and commercialization programs.      Mynvax is based in Bangalore and was incubated at the Indian Institute of Science and is known for developing indigenous vaccine technologies for human respiratory viruses including influenza and COVID-19.      Responsibilities      In this role, you would implement upstream and downstream processing protocols for various protein antigens in small to medium scale cell culture bioreactors to develop manufacturing protocols for vaccine antigen production.      Your work will have a direct impact on development of recombinant sub-unit vaccines for influenza and Covid19 and will involve collaborations with researchers at IISc as well as other Indian and international institutions.        As a new Research Associate, you will become familiar with product development, regulatory requirements for vaccine and biologics development in India and overseas, learn new techniques, appreciate how to work in a cross-functional team, and develop leadership qualities.      Qualifications      Academic Disciplines: M.Sc., M.Tech., Biotechnology, Bioprocessing.          Experience: 1- or 2-years experience with cell culture, handling small volume bioreactors; downstream FPLC processes and instrumentation.          Fresh graduates with Industry based internship will also be considered.
column11: Process Associate, Cell culture, Biotechnology, SUB, Downstream processing, Process development, Instrumentation, Research Associate, Internship, Downstream

column2: Role Summary:   We are seeking a C++ Developer with entry-level to mid-level (1-3 years) experience who can contribute to developing high-performance applications. Familiarity with computer vision technologies is considered a significant advantage. This role involves working closely with our development team to design, implement, and maintain software that meets the evolving needs of our customers. Role & responsibilities: Develop and maintain robust code primarily using C++. Participate in the design, architecture, and implementation of complex software      applications. Collaborate with other team members to integrate systems and technologies effectively. Troubleshoot and optimize existing software. Engage in code reviews to maintain high-quality development standards. Learn and apply new technologies, best design practices and usability patterns. Contribute to the development of project timelines and project artifacts. Employ GIT for version control and source code management throughout the development lifecycle. Preferred candidate profile     Familiarity with computer vision or related fields. Experience with additional programming languages such as Python or JS. Knowledge of algorithm optimization and data structures. Experience with graphical user interfaces(QT), real-time systems, or embedded systems    Required Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field. Proficient in C++ with a strong understanding of object-oriented programming. Experience with software development lifecycle and methodologies. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Excellent collaboration and communication skills.

column2: Clinical SAS programmer ||  Job Opportunity with one of the largest Pharmaceutical & Clinical Research services company, (MNC)  If you are somebody who is seeking for a  Clinical SAS programmer  for Pharmaceutical & Clinical Research services company, (MNC)  (Contract to hire Conversion / Extension) - Initial 1 years and Extension, this would be the right opportunity for you! Requirement  Experience: 8+ years less Bachelors degree in statistics, biostatistics, mathematics, computer science or life sciences required. Minimum of 5 years clinical / statistical programming experience within pharmaceutical clinical development - Supporting regulatory filings (e.g., NDA, BLA, MAA) Principle SAAS Programmer, Sr. SAAS Programmer, SDTM, ADAN, TLF Knowledge of the drug development process, clinical trial methodology, statistics, and familiarity with global regulatory requirements Experience in other software packages (e.g., R) Experience with the Linux operating system.  Kindly go through the job description before applying! We are looking for candidates with who can join immediately (Max 15 Days).    Please fill the below details and send your updated CV to dbhoyar@astoncarter.com Current employer: Total Years of experience / Relevant experience: Experience into Principle SAAS Programmer, Sr. SAAS Programmer, SDTM, ADAN, TLF: Experience into SAS programs to generate derived analysis datasets: Experience into statistical terminology, clinical tests, medical terminology, and protocol designs: Experience into clinical / statistical programming experience within pharmaceutical clinical development - Supporting regulatory filings (e.g., NDA, BLA, MAA): Experience into Linux operating system: Experience into ADaM, Data Definition Table, e-submission: Experience into handling and processing of upstream data, e.g., multiple data forms, workflow, eDC, SDTM.:  Experience into software tools and applications, e.g., MS office, XML, Pinnacle 21:  Experience into programming experience in any industry recommended in Pharmaceutical / Clinical Research:  Education into bachelors degree in statistics, biostatistics, mathematics, computer science or life sciences: Notice period: CTC: ECTC: Location:  Preferred Location: Bangalore + Remote  Are you okay with work from Office / Hybrid / Remote? Reason why are you looking for change:  Are you okay with contract to hire? Introduction of candidate (Kindly give us brief introduction)?  Role  Clinical SAS Programmer.  Description      Create SAS programs to generate derived   analysis datasets  and content for tables, listings, and figures; Perform   programming validation to ensure quality of analysis datasets and programming   outputs.    Provides programming support for project teams,   including development of programming strategies, standards, specifications,   and programmed analysis.   Support the electronic submission preparation and   review.    Reviews key planning documents  (e.g.,   statistical analysis plan, data presentation plan, data review plan) to   ensure alignment with development team objectives and clarity and completeness   of programming assumptions and requirements; Assesses impact on programming   activities.   Interacts with vendors regarding project   standards, programming conventions, programming specifications and file   transfers.   Provides leadership for ensuring  quality of   Global Biometric and Data Sciences (GBDS ) deliverables by consistently  applying   standards and complying with regulatory requirements, guidance and corporate   and departmental SOPs and work practices.    Identifies opportunities for increased efficiency   and consistency within GBDS and our interactions with strategic vendors.    Independently leads and / or performs   programming assignments with minimal supervision.    Support improvement initiatives   Minimum Requirements:    Bachelors degree in statistics, biostatistics,   mathematics, computer science or life sciences required.  At least 5 years programming experience in any   industry recommended.  For US positions: US military experience will be   considered towards industry experience.   Demonstrated proficiency in analytical programming.   Have in-depth understanding of clinical data   structure (e.g., CDISC standards) and relational database.   Demonstrated skills in using software tools and   applications, e. g., MS office, XML, Pinnacle 21 .    Demonstrated ability in the handling and   processing of upstream data, e.g., multiple data forms, workflow, eDC, SDTM.    Demonstrated ability in providing outputs to meet   downstream requirements, e.g.,  ADaM, Data Definition Table, e-submission.    Have good understanding of regulatory, industry,   and technology standards and requirements.   Have good knowledge of statistical terminology,   clinical tests, medical terminology, and protocol designs.   Demonstrated ability to work in a team environment   with clinical team members.   Preferred Requirements:    Minimum of 5 years clinical / statistical   programming experience within pharmaceutical clinical development -   Supporting regulatory filings (e.g., NDA, BLA, MAA)    Knowledge of the drug development process,   clinical trial methodology, statistics, and familiarity with global   regulatory requirements   Experience in other software packages (e.g., R)   Experience with the Linux operating system Regards, Dhanashri Bhoyar  dbhoyar@astoncarter.com https://www.linkedin.com/in/dhanashri-bhoyar-a4b7421b4/

column2: Project Role : Engineering Services Practitioner Project Role Description : Assist with end-to-end engineering services to develop technical engineering solutions to solve problems and achieve business objectives. Solve engineering problems and achieve business objectives using scientific, socio-economic, technical knowledge and practical experience. Work across structural and stress design, qualification, configuration and technical management.  Must have skills : Aircraft Structural Analysis Good to have skills : NA Minimum  2  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Bachelors or Masters degree in Mechanical or Aerospace or Structural engineering WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU? Performs static stress analysis or fatigue and damage tolerance analysis of aircraft structures using a broad range of standard hand, legacy and harmonized methods, responsible for checking various types of aircraft components and assemblies:Door Surround Structures, Side and Lower Shells, Pax and Cargo Floors, Skins, stringers, various clips, fasteners, joints and fittings etc. To support Sizing & Justification phase.What you would do in this role Experience in Sizing and justification of metallic/Composite primary and secondary aircraft structural components. Experience in Door Surround Structures/Side shells/PAX floors. Experience in GFEM/DFEM creation and Validation Knowledge of airframe static stress analysis including analytical calculation methods (HSB/Niu/Bruhn) and finite element-based analysis. Stress analysis of Metallic and Composite Aircraft Structural components using FEM, ISAMI and Hand Calculations. Experience in ISAMI based analysis. Experience in Buckling and Modal Analysis. Experience in engineering tools, (ISAMI, Hypermesh, NASTRAN, PATRAN, MS Office). Basic Knowledge on CATIA and experience in reading assembly drawings Experience in Technical Report writing skills. Who are we looking for? 1 to 4 years of Aerostructure Stress Analysis Experience Location:Bangalore Education:BE/M.Tech in Mechanical, Aerospace, Aeronautical Engineering or relevant subject Ability to work individually. Supporting continuous improvement initiatives to increase team efficiency. Highly preferred primary and secondary structure experience with good knowledge of tools and methods. Hypermesh, Nastran/Patran, ISAMI Having VBA/Python programming is an added advantage.Additional Information: The candidate should have experience in Aircraft Structural Analysis. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in Aerospace Engineering or a related field. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification Bachelors or Masters degree in Mechanical or Aerospace or Structural engineering

column2: Must have a good track record in academics and have passion for research Must have clarity of expression; written and oral communication skills should carry-out research in the field of relevant specialization? Synthetic skills and interpretation of characterization (modern analytical instruments) would be preferred? Should publish quality research articles APPLY @   https://psgsonscharities.freshteam.com/jobs Qualifications: M.Sc. in general chemistry/ applied chemistry/ polymer chemistry/ industrial chemistry/ analytical chemistry/ textile chemistry/ material science/ bio-technology/ nanoscience and technology/ any other equivalent degree in the relevant field. Required skill set: Basic knowledge in fundamental concepts of chemical principles and theory with passion for research work are preferable. About the Institution: PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research (PSGiTech), an institution of PSG and Sons Charities, started in the year 2014, is an AICTE approved institution and affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. It is currently offering UG programmes in Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Artificial Intelligence & Data Science and Computer Science & Business Systems. The institution also offers PG programmes in Structural Engineering and Engineering Design. Five UG programmes are accredited by NBA. The Institution is ranked between 100- 150 in NIRF Ranking. PSGiTech aims to achieve excellence in education and research and nurture engineers with ethics, who will face global challenges to serve industry and society Polymer Engineering Laboratory has been established in PSG Institute of Technology and Applied Research to initiate multidisciplinary research and development activities in science and engineering. The research laboratory is actively engaged in the development of sustainable and cutting-edge polymeric materials and industrial chemical products required for civil, electrical, electronics, mechanical, textile and environmental engineering applications.

column2: Job Title: Senior/ Expert Golang Developer (R&D) Experience: 10 to 13 years Qualification: BE/ B.Tech/ M.Tech (No BSc, BCA, MCA) Targeted Company:  Only from Product Development/ E-commerce Mandatory Skills: Must have experience in  Golang, Docker, Kubernetes and Kafka Key Responsibilities: Software Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of scalable applications using Golang. Implement microservices architecture and develop high-performance, reliable RESTful APIs. Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code, adhering to industry best practices and coding standards. Perform rigorous unit testing and code reviews to ensure the highest quality standards. Containerization and Orchestration: Design, deploy, and manage applications using Docker containers. Utilize Kubernetes for orchestration and management of containerized applications. Ensure seamless integration and deployment using CI/CD pipelines. Event Streaming: Implement and manage event streaming and messaging using Apache Kafka. Design and maintain data pipelines and streaming applications for real-time processing and analytics. System Architecture & Design:  Contribute to the design and architecture of complex, distributed systems. Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and security. Identify and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks and ensure system reliability. Leadership & Mentorship: Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. Lead technical discussions, provide architectural guidance, and contribute to strategic planning. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other stakeholders. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in Golang, Docker, Kubernetes, and Kafka. Proactively seek ways to improve development processes and implement new tools and technologies. Participate in and contribute to open-source projects and community engagements. Required Skills and Qualifications: Technical Skills: Extensive experience in Golang programming with a deep understanding of its ecosystem. Proficiency in containerization technologies such as Docker. Strong expertise in Kubernetes for container orchestration and management. Solid experience with Apache Kafka for building scalable and fault-tolerant event streaming systems. In-depth knowledge of microservices architecture and design patterns. Strong understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software design principles. Experience with relational and NoSQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, etc. Proficient in using version control systems such as Git. Soft Skills: Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong leadership and mentoring abilities. Exceptional communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work effectively in a dynamic and fast-paced environment. Self-motivated with a high degree of ownership and accountability. Preferred Qualifications: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Knowledge of CI/CD tools like Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI. Familiarity with front-end technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React or Angular. Understanding of security best practices in software development. Experience with automated testing frameworks and methodologies.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Supervise compliance to all cGMP, GxP or any other regulatory requirements including EH&S require-ments. Development of economically efficient process from R&D lab scale to plant scale by understanding the process in details with concerned scientists and by taking the lab batch demonstration at R&D. Preparation of technical data, preparation, review and approving PFD and Preparation of P&ID as per the process and provide it to plant. Sharing the process details as & when required process training of all the stages to the plant personnel before starting the batch. To attend / arrange HAZOP & Job safety analysis is being carried out before starting new product or any process change. Plan mock trails as per requirement before Startup. Providing/ensuring safety gadgets are available as per HAZOP Recommendation and to Ensure no leakage in the system/Lines to avoid inci-dents/accidents. Ensure availability of MSDS for all the critical / noncritical solvents/raw materials. As a member of our team, you will contribute to the development and optimization of software components. Work on kernel subsystems, including memory management, file systems, and process scheduling. Device Driver Development: Develop and maintain device drivers for various hardware components. Ensure high performance and stability of drivers for embedded systems and mobile devices. Debug and resolve issues in existing drivers and contribute to continuous improvement. System Integration and Testing: Integrate developed kernel modules and drivers with the overall system. Perform rigorous testing and validation to ensure reliability and performance. Collaborate with QA teams to develop and execute test plans. Performance Optimization: Analyze and optimize system performance, focusing on low-level software components. Identify bottlenecks and implement improvements for better efficiency. Collaboration and Documentation: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including hardware engineers, system architects, and application developers. Document design specifications, implementation details, and testing procedures. Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.

column2: Summary: The Software Engineer position requires embedded aerospace domain experience and will be based out of our Bangalore office. This position reports to the India R&D Engineering Director for Measurement and Power Systems (MPS) and offers a challenging role in a rapidly growing engineering organization. Duties may include all activities related to the aerospace software development life cycle and adherence to DO-178B/C. The person in this position is expected to be an independent contributor able to work in a collaborative and fast-paced engineering environment. Strong written and oral communication are essential for status reporting, milestone deliverables, and effectively interfacing directly with team members, customers, and program managers. Responsibilities: Development of software plans and standards Collaboration with Hardware/System Architects in defining and reviewing customer requirements and defining software/ HW-SW interface requirements. Architecting software designs that are scalable, portable and efficient with respect to defined requirements Developing functional and certifiable code to strict design and coding standards. Developing and reviewing documents that show compliance and traceability of system requirements, through software requirements, code and tests.  Responsible for integration of software with hardware. Perform high-level and low-level software verification to ensure functionality to the corresponding requirements. Review of artefacts developed by peers Compilation of test results, problem reporting, troubleshooting and problem closure. Develop and review certification documents including the software configuration index and accomplishment summary. Participate in audits conducted by client and certification authorities, to explain all technical aspects of the software. Mandatory Skills: Bachelors degree in Electronics or Computer Science engineering with a minimum of 8 years of industry experience. Strong C Programming skills Experience in Embedded Software development for Aerospace domain Very strong knowledge in DO-178B/C Device driver development for various peripherals like ARINC 429, I2C, SPI, UART, CAN, ADC and DAC etc., Hands on experience in working on processors from ARM, Microchip, ST Micro or TI family. Working knowledge on tools like IAR, CCS, Code warrior and KIEL. Experience with usage of hardware tools like oscilloscopes, analysers and complex test systems. Excellent written/oral communication skills Structural coverage using CANTATA++ and RTRT. Experience in development and execution of test cases for high level testing, board bring-up activity, integration testing, and low-level testing.  Preferred Skills: Working knowledge of Tools like DOORS for requirements management, Mantis for issue tracking and PVCS for configuration management At least one full-cycle engineering project in Aerospace domain Familiarity with working in a lean environment Development of test software using Lab View, Visual studio and C#. ATE software development Exposure to UML based design

To be responsible for applying      formulation engineering processing knowledge to identify solutions that      improve capacity through data analysis, quality and cost efficiency at      manufacturing sites.  To perform the eng./technical      calculations using the concepts of      Process Engineering (Mathematical modeling, DoE, Process Design, Process      simulation, Equipment equivalency, scale up tools, and Automation, etc.) for Process scale at formulation      manufacturing sites. To lead and participate in continuous      improvement projects aimed at optimizing manufacturing processes and      enhancing overall efficiency. To participate      in the development of novel process technologies from concept to      commercialization internally / externally with academic institutions or      consultants etc  To have deep experience in using process analytical      technologies (PAT) in combination with mathematical models (both      statistical & first principle) to enhance process understanding      to effectively develop/ optimize/ scale-up and troubleshoot processes. To collaborate with cross function      teams to analyze current processes and identify areas for improvement in      productivity, quality and cost-effectiveness. To investigate and address root      causes related to the manufacturing process.  To be responsible      for Technology Transfer and launch of new products at Unichem Formulation      mfg. sites.  To maintain good documentation of      experiments in the lab and ensure adequate      and functioning equipment in labs.   KEY SKILLS and COMPETENCIES Should be organized and detail oriented Should have proficient computer skills (MS Office, data analysis, Engg. softwares others) Should have good oral and written communication skills Should be able to work independently and /or/ with the team Should have a high sense of responsibility regarding scientific and professional activities. column2: You will be part of the Knowledge Hub of Quest Alliance. This is an interdisciplinary role that focuses on capturing, synthesising and disseminating knowledge that is shaping or is likely to shape the discourse in education, youth skilling, education technology in the coming decade. The research coordinator will work closely with the Research Specialist in formulating research agenda for the organisation and in carrying out primary and secondary research.                                             Job Description :                                               - Proactively design and execute a cohesive and focused research program for critical area(s) for the organisation with a youth-centric lens. This will include:                                               Conceptualising research design (qualitative and quantitative) and methodology                                             Ability to prioritise research questions based on organisational priorities.                                             Investigating and consolidating secondary research, including mapping trends and discourses in the field and the sector                                               Coordinating logistics in case of primary research                                               - Analyse, synthesise and distil research findings into knowledge products which can be appreciated by a wider audience - including reports, academic papers, blogs, and op-eds.                                   -                          Be able to guide creation of impactful artefacts from research findings that are both visually appealing and rich in description and bring clarity to the topic being studied.                                   - Conceptualise and design the flagship event Quest2Learn to build dialogue in the sector anchored on research.                                           -                          Assist in information dissemination within the various programs in Quest as well as to external stakeholders for different purposes                             Requirements                  We are looking for people who:                                   Eligibility:                                     A Masters degree (or higher) in Education/Social Sciences/Development Studies/Social Design/Design Research.                                   3+ years of experience in both qualitative and quantitative research preferably in education, skills development, and/or livelihoods.                                   Well established portfolio of research techniques, including ethnographic methods.                                    Demonstrated experience in working collaboratively in a team.                                   Passionate about the challenges India is facing in the education and employability domain.                                   Willingness to travel to field locations, as per need to conduct research.                                   An interest in experimenting with research methods.                                     Required Qualifications:                                     Experience in holding research projects from beginning to end.                                   Demonstrated experience in qualitative and quantitative research methods.                                   Excellent written and verbal communication skills.                                    Ability to write and plan research briefs, reports and other dissemination material.                                   Publications in the form of reports                                           Preferred Qualifications:                                     Established portfolio of research dissemination.                                    Experience in managing research and coordinating with research agencies/consultants                                    Publications in the form of research papers, and/or op-eds                                   Proficiency in Hindi and/or other regional languages preferred.

column2: A.  Company Overview   (Brief description of   the company) International SOS (www.internationalsos.com) is the worlds leading medical & travel security services company operating from over 1000 locations in more than 80 countries with more than 11,000 multi-cultural medical, security, and logistics experts. Our global services include medical and risk planning, preventative programs, in-country expertise, emergency response for travellers, expatriates, and their dependents of over 70 percent of the Fortune 500 companies. The International SOS Consulting business unit and regional practices focus on designing, marketing, and delivering advisory services, programs, and managed services to our clients. The overall delivery framework comprises of: Advisory: Providing clients with the global expertise and resources necessary to develop best-in-class risk mitigation and workplace programs. We also provide access to our medical and security experts to help build internal systems to best prepare, respond to and manage issues most critical to the organization.  Programs: Providing clients with a market-leading suite of end-to-end advisory and management services. We also provide oversight of the client journey, inclusive of process and protocol finalisation, to effectively engage clients, successfully implement their solutions, and position them for ongoing success.  Managed Services: Providing select clients with customised solutions that might include services ranging from information analysis, assessment, service arrangement, forecasting and advisory.    B.  Overall Purpose of The Job   (Brief   description of the primary purpose of this position)   The Analyst, Project   Access will work in close collaboration with   all other analysts (both medical and operations) in the CKC. The Analyst, Project Access assists with researching, and compiling of medical content for medical deliverables including but not limited to: Medical   Evacuation Response Plans, Trip and Event Support Plans, etc.   C. Work within and promote all International SOSs policies, procedures   and corporate values. D.  Job Profile   Required Skills and   Competencies  Excellent   communication and written English Professional communication, presentation and interpersonal skills Time management Team player Confident decision   making Able to work in   a matrix and functional organization Required Qualifications BS/ BA/   Graduate.  3 to 5 years of   experience in similar role. column2: We are looking candidates for Junior Assistant Manager - Applied Technology with leading MNC company, Thane. Education, Certification and/or relevant experience required : Bachelors degree in chemistry / Polymer Science or Engineering in Chemical / Polymer Technology with 3-6 years of experience in similar profile. Purpose of the position: The PU laboratory will be run and administrated under the internal and external procedures and regulations. Customer or innovation related lab work is carried out & reports are created. Tracking of KPI figures for key lab group tasks is conducted. Responsibilities :  Responsible to perform lab experiments (by hand mixing / machine) in the lab with different formulations, quality testing of foams to assess the product performance, raw material analysis & testing, identification of relevant test methods in alignment with customers (if applicable), if necessary, adjustment of methods within complex test setups to optimize results. Responsible person for issue, review & update of instructions and procedures in alignment with global OU responsible persons; execution of all relevant Global Code of Conduct, ESHQ rules, EHS Audit, Internal & external Audit in the OU Lab. Responsible to assist the Regional Technical Manager to conduct chemical & physical laboratory tests & making qualitative & quantitative analysis of foam materials for troubleshooting, formulation development/ finetuning & New customer projects. Responsible for assigned lab projects from all categories (customer projects / innovation projects / positioning projects).  Managing the inventory of chemicals, consumables, and equipment. Ordering, monitoring and disposal activities of chemicals and scrap foams

column2: IRIS SOLUTIONS is looking for Manager - Research to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Manager of Research to lead our research team      The ideal candidate will have a strong background in conducting both qualitative and quantitative research, along with excellent leadership and project management skills        Responsibilities:        Lead and manage a team of researchers, providing guidance, mentorship, and support to ensure the successful execution of research projects      Design and implement research strategies to address key business objectives, utilizing a variety of research methodologies      Oversee the development of research proposals, including defining research objectives, methodologies, timelines, and budgets      Conduct literature reviews, gather data, analyze findings, and prepare comprehensive research reports and presentations      Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product development, marketing, and sales, to integrate research findings into business strategies and decision-making processes      Stay abreast of industry trends, market developments, and competitor activities to inform research priorities and strategies      Ensure adherence to ethical guidelines and best practices in research conduct and data management      Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement within the research team, promoting creativity and excellence in research methodologies and practices      Manage relationships with external research partners, vendors, and consultants as needed      Support the professional development of team members through training, coaching, and performance feedback
